name: School Bus Drive Sim
description:
School Bus Drive Sim are waiting to be picked up, to get dropped to their primary and high schools through futuristic bus. School Bus Drive Sim is the best bus simulator for all who like bus simulator games, bus parking 2018, car parking games and other flying school bus and passenger like public transport games. Dropping off school kids on time is the challenge for any school bus driver in this school bus driving simulator. So, start your engine, get on the road and take your coach to school!

FEATURES
- Explore the Big City Environment
- Pick and Drop School Kids
- A Unique Concept for School Going Kids
- Amazing Gameplay with HD Graphics
- Realistic city environment Map
- Intelligent Traffic System
- Cool and smooth graphics
- Amazing Bus Selection mode
